radiographic_examinations.findings: Slight elevation in fasting serum glucose level of 102 mg/dl (5.7mmol/L), with normal 1- and 2-hour serum glucose values.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: A second OGTT performed in 2018 was normal, with an absence of previously observed IFG.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal results; fasting glucose of 94 mg/dl (5.2mmol/L), 1-hour glucose of 125 mg/dl (6.9mmol/L), and 2-hour glucose of 63 mg/dl (3.5mmol/L).
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Improved glucose tolerance observed from 2016 to 2018 despite elevated HbA1c.

radiographic_examinations.findings: 1-hour serum glucose of 241 mg/dl (13.4 mmol/L) and 2-hour glucose of 204 mg/dl (11.3 mmol/L), diagnostic of Type 2 diabetes.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Significant increase in insulin and glucose response indicating altered Î²-cell function and increased insulin resistance.
